A Touch of Luxury Furniture Set.name: A Touch of Luxury Furniture Set
A Touch of Luxury Furniture Set.description: This Furniture Set makes your Cargo Container almost feel like a home.

Cargo Container Chic Furniture Set.name: Cargo Container Chic Furniture Set
Cargo Container Chic Furniture Set.description: It might be cheap, but it is real furniture. This is the starting Furniture Set for most cargo containers.

Fire Safe.name: Fire Safe
Fire Safe.description:
Small fireproof lockbox made of Thick Steel.

  • 50HP
  • 30cm / 1ft
  • Can be picked with a DV15 Pick Lock Skill Check

Hidden Compartment.name: Hidden Compartment
Hidden Compartment.description:
A small hidden compartment inside the Cargo Container.

  • 15.25x30x7.5cm / 6x12x3in
  • Can be found with a DV15 Conceal/Reveal Object Skill Check

Koff Popper.name: Koff Popper
Koff Popper.description:
The Continental Brands Koff Popper is the only specialty thermos you'll need.

  • Thermos with built in Kof Pop brewer
  • Holds 237ml/8oz
  • Can only be purchased at an Oasis store

Koff Pops.name: Koff Pops
Koff Pops.description:
Koff Pops used with the Continental Brands Koff Popper. 

  • Pack of 10
  • Included in Kibble or higher lifestyle

Second-hand Special Furniture Set.name: Second-hand Special Furniture Set
Second-hand Special Furniture Set.description: It may not look pretty, but it works. This furniture Set is the bare minimum your Cargo Container needs.

Smart Vanity.name: Smart Vanity
Smart Vanity.description: Smart grooming station. Comes fully equipped with any tools and makeup you'll need.
